name: E-Startup
description: E-Startup is a sandbox business simulation game in a low-poly universe. Build, buy resources to create products and complete contracts, invest in the stock market or design your own sites and software to become rich and popular!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel, AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 6000 Series or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel, AMD Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 Series or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
